bio:treatment.description: Plants 5–20 cm. Stems (branched proximally) tomentose (not stipitate-glandular). Leaves 10–18 × 3–4 cm, deeply pinnately lobed (lobed remote, lanceolate or linear, entire or dentate). Heads 2–9. Peduncles tomentulose, eglandular. Phyllaries 8–12, tomentulose, eglandular, often glabrous distally. Florets 12–40. Cypselae dark brown.
Ridgetops, black shale hills, volcanic aggregate, gravelly soils;
Calif., Colo., Mont., Oreg., Wash., Wyo.
